p: Data from GTEx and TCGA were log 2 transformed. The cohorts from GTEx and TCGA were matched based on anatomical site, in total there were 20 sites. Mean log 2 TPM expression of ACE2, TMPRSS2 and CTSL was calculated for each tissue for both databases. The tissues were then ranked using the R function rank, 1 being the highest expression, 20 the lowest. The ranks were visualized using ggplot2. Wilcoxon signed rank tests were performed to compare ACE2, TMPRSS2 and CTSL expression for tissues of interest, normal tissues (GTEx) compared to cancerous tissues (TCGA). Overall expression of ACE, TMPRSS2, and CTSL was visualised for all tissues from TCGA and TARGET. Tukeys test was performed in R to determine significance.
